TblsCpuMemMetrics: UPDATE  cpumemmetrics SET (FriendlyFQDD,NonC0ResidencyLow,NonC0ResidencyHigh,CUPSIIOBandwidthPort3,CUPSIIOBandwidthPort2,CUPSIIOBandwidthPort1,CUPSIIOBandwidthPort0,CUPSIIOBandwidthDMI,CPUC0ResidencyLow,CPUC0ResidencyHigh) = (SELECT FriendlyFQDD,CpuMemoryMetrics_DOT_NonC0ResidencyLow_DOT_value,CpuMemoryMetrics_DOT_NonC0ResidencyHigh_DOT_value,CpuMemoryMetrics_DOT_CUPSIIOBandwidthPort3_DOT_value,CpuMemoryMetrics_DOT_CUPSIIOBandwidthPort2_DOT_value,CpuMemoryMetrics_DOT_CUPSIIOBandwidthPort1_DOT_value,CpuMemoryMetrics_DOT_CUPSIIOBandwidthPort0_DOT_value,CpuMemoryMetrics_DOT_CUPSIIOBandwidthDMI_DOT_value,CpuMemoryMetrics_DOT_CPUC0ResidencyLow_DOT_value,CpuMemoryMetrics_DOT_CPUC0ResidencyHigh_DOT_value FROM TblsCpuMemMetrics WHERE fqdd = "%s" ) WHERE ROWID IN (SELECT ROWID FROM cpumemmetrics WHERE UNIQUEID = "%s" ORDER BY __Last_Update_TS DESC LIMIT 1);
TblsCurrentCUPS: UPDATE  cups SET (SystemUsage,MemoryUsage,IOUsage,FriendlyFQDD,CPUUsage) = (SELECT SystemCupsCurrent,MemoryCupsCurrent,IoCupsCurrent,FriendlyFQDD,CpuCupsCurrent FROM TblsCurrentCUPS WHERE fqdd = "%s" ) WHERE ROWID IN (SELECT ROWID FROM cups WHERE UNIQUEID = "%s" ORDER BY __Last_Update_TS DESC LIMIT 1);
TblsPowerMetrics: UPDATE  powermetrics SET (TotalStoragePower,TotalPciePower,TotalMemoryPower,TotalFanPower,TotalCPUPower,SystemPowerConsumption,SystemHeadRoomInstantaneous,FriendlyFQDD,SystemOutputPower,SystemInputPower) = (SELECT TotalStoragePower,TotalPciePower,TotalMemoryPower,TotalFanPower,TotalCPUPower,SystemPwrConsumption,SystemHeadRoomInstantaneous,FriendlyFQDD,CurrentSystemOutputPower,CurrentSystemInputPower FROM TblsPowerMetrics WHERE fqdd = "%s" ) WHERE ROWID IN (SELECT ROWID FROM powermetrics WHERE UNIQUEID = "%s" ORDER BY __Last_Update_TS DESC LIMIT 1);
TblsPowerStatistics: UPDATE  powerstatistics SET (LastWeekMinPowerTime,LastWeekMinPower,LastWeekMaxPowerTime,LastWeekMaxPower,LastWeekAvgPower,LastMinuteMinPowerTime,LastMinuteMinPower,LastMinuteMaxPowerTime,LastMinuteMaxPower,LastMinuteAvgPower,LastHourMinPowerTime,LastHourMinPower,LastHourMaxPowerTime,LastHourMaxPower,LastHourAvgPower,LastDayMinPowerTime,LastDayMinPower,LastDayMaxPowerTime,LastDayMaxPower,LastDayAvgPower,FriendlyFQDD) = (SELECT LastWeekMinPowerTime,LastWeekMinPower,LastWeekMaxPowerTime,LastWeekMaxPower,LastWeekAvgPower,LastMinuteMinPowerTime,LastMinuteMinPower,LastMinuteMaxPowerTime,LastMinuteMaxPower,LastMinuteAvgPower,LastHourMinPowerTime,LastHourMinPower,LastHourMaxPowerTime,LastHourMaxPower,LastHourAvgPower,LastDayMinPowerTime,LastDayMinPower,LastDayMaxPowerTime,LastDayMaxPower,LastDayAvgPower,FriendlyFQDD FROM TblsPowerStatistics WHERE fqdd = "%s" ) WHERE ROWID IN (SELECT ROWID FROM powerstatistics WHERE UNIQUEID = "%s" ORDER BY __Last_Update_TS DESC LIMIT 1);
TblsThermalMetrics: UPDATE  thermalmetrics SET (TotalPSUHeatDissipation,SysRackTempDelta,SysNetAirflow,SysAirflowUtilization,SysAirflowPerSysInputPower,SysAirflowPerFanPower,SysAirFlowEfficiency,PowerToCoolRatio,PSUEfficiency,ITUE,FriendlyFQDD,ComputePower) = (SELECT TotalPSUHeatDissipation,SysRackTempDelta,SysNetAirflow,SysAirflowUtilization,SysAirflowPerSysInputPower,SysAirflowPerFanPower,SysAirFlowEfficiency,PowerToCoolRatio,PSUEfficiency,ITUE,FriendlyFQDD,ComputePower FROM TblsThermalMetrics WHERE fqdd = "%s" ) WHERE ROWID IN (SELECT ROWID FROM thermalmetrics WHERE UNIQUEID = "%s" ORDER BY __Last_Update_TS DESC LIMIT 1);
TblsFPGASensor: UPDATE  fpgasensor SET (FriendlyFQDD,TemperatureReading) = (SELECT friendlyFQDD,CurrentReading FROM TblsFPGASensor WHERE fqdd = "%s" ) WHERE ROWID IN (SELECT ROWID FROM fpgasensor WHERE UNIQUEID = "%s" ORDER BY __Last_Update_TS DESC LIMIT 1);
TblsMemorySensor: UPDATE  memorysensor SET (FriendlyFQDD,TemperatureReading) = (SELECT FriendlyFQDD,CurrentReading FROM TblsMemorySensor WHERE FQDD = "%s" ) WHERE ROWID IN (SELECT ROWID FROM memorysensor WHERE UNIQUEID = "%s" ORDER BY __Last_Update_TS DESC LIMIT 1);
TblsStorageSensor: UPDATE  storagesensor SET (FriendlyFQDD,TemperatureReading) = (SELECT FriendlyFQDD,CurrentReading FROM TblsStorageSensor WHERE FQDD = "%s" ) WHERE ROWID IN (SELECT ROWID FROM storagesensor WHERE UNIQUEID = "%s" ORDER BY __Last_Update_TS DESC LIMIT 1);
TblsPSUMetrics: UPDATE  psumetrics SET (FriendlyFQDD,Temperature,FanSpeed) = (SELECT fqdd,Temperature,FanSpeed FROM TblsPSUMetrics WHERE fqdd = "%s" ) WHERE ROWID IN (SELECT ROWID FROM psumetrics WHERE UNIQUEID = "%s" ORDER BY __Last_Update_TS DESC LIMIT 1);
TblsAggregationMetrics: UPDATE  aggregationmetrics SET (SystemMaxPowerConsumption,SystemMaxInletTempHour,SystemAvgInletTempHour,FriendlyFQDD) = (SELECT SystemMaxPowerConsumption,SystemMaxInletTempHour,SystemAvgInletTempHour,FriendlyFQDD FROM TblsAggregationMetrics WHERE FQDD = "%s" ) WHERE ROWID IN (SELECT ROWID FROM aggregationmetrics WHERE UNIQUEID = "%s" ORDER BY __Last_Update_TS DESC LIMIT 1);
TblRAID_PDSmartData_NVMe: UPDATE  nvmesmartdata SET (PercentageUsed,CriticalWarning,CompositeTemparature,AvailableSpareThreshold,AvailableSpare,UnsafeShutdownsUpper,UnsafeShutdownsLower,PowerOnHoursUpper,PowerOnHoursLower,PowerCyclesUpper,PowerCyclesLower,NumOfErrorInfoLogEntriesUpper,NumOfErrorInfoLogEntriesLower,MediaDataIntegrityErrorsUpper,MediaDataIntegrityErrorsLower,HostWriteCommandsUpper,HostWriteCommandsLower,HostReadCommandsUpper,HostReadCommandsLower,DataUnitsWrittenUpper,DataUnitsWrittenLower,DataUnitsReadUpper,DataUnitsReadLower,ControllerBusyTimeUpper,ControllerBusyTimeLower,FriendlyFQDD) = (SELECT smartData_DOT_percentageUsed,smartData_DOT_criticalWarning,smartData_DOT_compositeTemparature,smartData_DOT_availableSpareThreshold,smartData_DOT_availableSpare,smartData_DOT_UnsafeShutdowns_DOT_Upper,smartData_DOT_UnsafeShutdowns_DOT_Lower,smartData_DOT_PowerOnHours_DOT_Upper,smartData_DOT_PowerOnHours_DOT_Lower,smartData_DOT_PowerCycles_DOT_Upper,smartData_DOT_PowerCycles_DOT_Lower,smartData_DOT_NumOfErrorInfoLogEntries_DOT_Upper,smartData_DOT_NumOfErrorInfoLogEntries_DOT_Lower,smartData_DOT_MediaAndDataIntegrityErrs_DOT_Upper,smartData_DOT_MediaAndDataIntegrityErrs_DOT_Lower,smartData_DOT_HostWriteCmds_DOT_Upper,smartData_DOT_HostWriteCmds_DOT_Lower,smartData_DOT_HostReadCmds_DOT_Upper,smartData_DOT_HostReadCmds_DOT_Lower,smartData_DOT_DataUnitsWritten_DOT_Upper,smartData_DOT_DataUnitsWritten_DOT_Lower,smartData_DOT_DataUnitsRead_DOT_Upper,smartData_DOT_DataUnitsRead_DOT_Lower,smartData_DOT_ControllerBusyTime_DOT_Upper,smartData_DOT_ControllerBusyTime_DOT_Lower,fqdd FROM TblRAID_PDSmartData_NVMe WHERE fqdd = "%s" ) WHERE ROWID IN (SELECT ROWID FROM nvmesmartdata WHERE UNIQUEID = "%s" ORDER BY __Last_Update_TS DESC LIMIT 1);

cpusensor-TblProbeObj: UPDATE  cpusensor SET (__UnitModifier,SensorType,SensorName,FriendlyFQDD,DeviceId,TemperatureReading) = (SELECT UnitModifier,SensorType,ElementName,ElementName,DeviceID,CurrentReading FROM CIMVIEW_DCIM_NumericSensor WHERE DeviceID = "%s" ) WHERE ROWID IN (SELECT ROWID FROM cpusensor WHERE UNIQUEID = "%s" ORDER BY __Last_Update_TS DESC LIMIT 1);
sensor-TblProbeObj: UPDATE  sensor SET (__UnitModifier,MetricPrefix,FriendlyFQDD,SensorName,DeviceId,Reading) = (SELECT UnitModifier,SensorType,ElementName,ElementName,DeviceID,CurrentReading FROM CIMVIEW_DCIM_NumericSensor WHERE DeviceID = "%s" ) WHERE ROWID IN (SELECT ROWID FROM sensor WHERE UNIQUEID = "%s" ORDER BY __Last_Update_TS DESC LIMIT 1);UPDATE  sensor SET (__UnitModifier,MetricPrefix,FriendlyFQDD,SensorName,DeviceId,Reading) = (SELECT UnitModifier,SensorType,ElementName,ElementName,DeviceID,CurrentReading FROM  CIMVIEW_DCIM_PSNumericSensor WHERE DeviceID = "%s" ) WHERE ROWID IN (SELECT ROWID FROM sensor WHERE UNIQUEID = "%s" ORDER BY __Last_Update_TS DESC LIMIT 1);
